• about me

    Hi! My name is Daniel Ormisher. I am a web developer, and this is my site. On here you can find information about me and what I'm interested in, see examples of my work, and (if you go to my blog) see what wondrous thoughts are emanating from my brain. If you wish to speak to me for any reason please don't hesitate to contact me.
